fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils

Class DCVMCyclicBarrierClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrierClient

  • public class DCVMCyclicBarrierClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DCVMCyclicBarrierClient implements the client side of the distributed cyclic wait barrier mechanism.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-01-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.io.BufferedReader cyclicBarrierBR
      a buffered reader to read from the socket.
      protected java.io.PrintStream cyclicBarrierPS
      a print stream to write onto the socket.
      protected java.net.Socket cyclicBarrierSignalingSocket
      socket used to exchange signals with the wait barrier.
      protected java.lang.String hostname
      name of the host that executes the process to be synchronised.
      protected java.lang.String jvmURI
      URI of the JVM that is executing the process to be synchronised.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DCVMCyclicBarrierClient(java.lang.String cyclicBarrierHostname, int cyclicBarrierPort, java.lang.String hostname, java.lang.String jvmURI)
      create the client side object implementing the wait behaviour.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeBarrier()
      closing the connection with the central distributed cyclic barrier.
      void waitBarrier()
      signal the current virtual machine to the central distributed cyclic barrier and then wait for the signal from the barrier before resuming execution.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DCVMCyclicBarrierClient

        public DCVMCyclicBarrierClient(java.lang.String cyclicBarrierHostname,
                               int cyclicBarrierPort,
                               java.lang.String hostname,
                               java.lang.String jvmURI)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        create the client side object implementing the wait behaviour.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        cyclicBarrierHostname - name of the host running the cyclic barrier.
        cyclicBarrierPort - port number listen by the cyclic barrier.
        hostname - name of the host that executes the process to be synchronised.
        jvmURI - URI of the JVM that is executing the process to be synchronised.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - todo.
